summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, accepting easements for watermain purposes over, across and along property in Lot 5, Block 8, King County Addition; and property in portion vacated South Pearl Street in plat of the Chas. S. Johnson Addition to the City of Georgetown, Washington.; all in King County, Washington (Vacation of South Lucile Street-Petition No. 288231 and Vacation of South Pearl Street-Petition No. 290584).
